aboutText: I am a fullstack web developer. I enjoy creating web sites using current development technologies.
fastText: The site's performance is a priority
responsiveText: Web sites that work and look good in different screens
reactiveText: Instant reactions to the user's interactions
formTitle: Have a question or want to work together?

description.queues: This project is about taking tickets to for virtual queues. It aims to eliminate physical queues.
description.kanpeki: Santiaguero project that covers Asian and Western pop culture (includes Japanese, Korean, Chinese pop and traditional culture, etc.; in addition to video games, comics, literature in general, cinephilia and world-class music).
description.sanchoRestaurant: Sancho Restaurant, delicious cuisine specialties created with ingenuity and passion, inspired by the fantastic flavors of Spain.
description.zaruArquitectura: Design of different homes and custom exterior and interior decorations.
description.flowers: Sell flowers in their flowerpots so the clients can take care of them. Make the world a beautiful place.

frontendDescription: The visuals the beauty of the project.
backendDescription: Part of the app the user doesn't see. The brains of the project.
